UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Combating Escherichia coli O157:H7 with Functionalized Chickpea-Derived Antimicrobial Peptides.
Literature.Author: He Q, Yang Z, Zou Z, Qian M, Wang X, Zhang X, Yin Z, Wang J, Ye X, Liu D, Guo M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human hepatocyte cells HL-7702 (L02):14% Cytotoxicity=640 µg/ml,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:20% Cytotoxicity=640 µg/ml
